info.name: iWf_BIGIP_Device_Onboarding
info.description:
v1.0

This workflow can be used to create an Active/Standby Cluster between two BIG-IP devices using the iWorkflow Device Onboarding API.

request.description: Perform authentication and populate the {{f5_token}} variable

originalRequest.description: Perform authentication and populate the {{f5_token}} variable

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: Pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: X-Real-IP
header.description: Custom header

header.name: accept-encoding
header.description: Custom header

request.description: Wait for attribute state to be ACTIVE
Wait for attribute state to be ACTIVE

item.name: Add BIG-IP A Node to Local Connector
Get BIG-IP A Node Config Status

exec: f5_poll_until_all_tests_pass("Add BIG-IP B Node to Local Connector");

item.name: Add BIG-IP B Node to Local Connector
Get BIG-IP B Node Config Status

exec: f5_poll_until_all_tests_pass("Get BIG-IP B Task Status", error_vals);

request.description:
Wait for 
status: FINISHED
currentStep: SUCCESS

exec: f5_poll_until_all_tests_pass("Create Cluster Between BIG-IP A & B", error_vals);

request.description:
Wait for 
status: FINISHED
currentStep: SUCCESS

item.name: Create Cluster Between BIG-IP A & B

exec: f5_poll_until_all_tests_pass("Populate BIG-IP A REST Proxy Base URI", error_vals);

item.name: Populate BIG-IP A REST Proxy Base URI
Populate BIG-IP B REST Proxy Base URI
Get Cluster Status Using Rest Proxy
